title: Riot is literally owned by a dystopian Big Brother communist overlord.
body:
Watch this video, it's scary. Tencent started a program that assigns all Chinese citizens a "citizenship score" which is basically a numerical measure of their government loyalty.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lHcTKWiZ8sI

That's right, Tencent, who owns Riot Games, is starting an Orwellian nightmare. If Riot has any pride or morals they would break all ties with Tencent.

EDIT: We ought to take a hard stance against this until Riot delivers a satisfactory response and action plan against this. "Not our problem" is not good enough. I've posted a similar thread in Misc since threads from GD can't get on the Boards home front page. If we get it visible all of Boards will see and we'll have the best chance of Riot responding:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/FMINwB37-this-video-about-tencent-needs-more-visibility
